articles.title: Premier Makes Survey of Key Enterprises in Hamhung
articles.content:
Premier Makes Survey of Key Enterprises in Hamhung
 Hamhung, February 26 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of key enterprises in Hamhung City.
					 He learned in detail about the production and expansion of production capacity at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, February 8 Vinalon Complex and Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					
					 Consultative meetings held on the spot called for bringing about innovation in the production of Juche fertilizer, vinalon and custom-built equipment amid the flame of creating new advance speed.
					
					 Measures were discussed for relevant units to provide raw and other materials in time and in a responsible way by learning from the fighting spirit and the work style of those who created Kangwon spirit.
					
					 The premier also went round the Hungnam Terminal Factory and Sinpho Distant-Sea Fishery Complex where he pressed for measures for solving the issue of ensuring local production of terminals, modernizing the complex and renovating the production processes of the Sinpho Canned Fish Factory.

articles.title: History Society of DPRK Exposes Thrice-Cursed Crimes of Park Geun Hye Family
articles.content:
History Society of DPRK Exposes Thrice-Cursed Crimes of Park Geun Hye Family
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK issued an indictment Sunday disclosing the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the "yusin" family in order to teach the history the lesson that the nation has to suffer big misfortune and shame if it has such dirty group of traitors as the family of Park Geun Hye.
					 It is shame on the nation that it has the dirty family of matchless traitors as that of Park who prolong their lives with flunkeyism and commit only crimes while enjoying wealth and leading gay life in return for treachery to the nation, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye's grandfather Park Song Bin was a traitor who took a government post for his "meritorious deed" in taking the lead in quelling Jon Pong Jun peasant soldiers who rose under the banner of "rejection of west and Japan" and "promotion of national interests and welfare of the people".
					
					 This traitor was ancestor of top-class traitor Park Chung-hee to be followed by Park Geun Hye and other descendents who put the father into the shade.
					
					 An "imperial subject" who wrote a blood-written pledge of "loyalty" to the Japanese emperor, root cause of aggression and plunder which drenched the 3,000-ri land of golden tapestry with blood, was none other than Park Chung-hee.
					
					 Park Chung-hee's sycophancy toward the U.S. far surpassed her father's pro-Japanese treachery.
					
					 The father's pro-Japanese and pro-U.S. acts of treachery were given continuity by Park Geun Hye and his other offspring.
					
					 All the successive puppet rulers  relied on outsiders but none of them completely sold off the nation's dignity and interests without judgment being obsessed with flunkeyism and treachery as Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Park Geun Hye declared the permanent renouncement of the wartime operation control usurped by the U.S., worked desperate to bring THAAD to south Korea, nullified the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and opened the road of reinvasion for the Japanese reactionaries, sworn enemy of the Korean nation, through the conclusion of an agreement on the protection of military intelligence for aggression.
					
					 Park Geun Hye's family members have vied with each other in selling off the nation.
					
					 Her younger sister Park Geun Ryong called Japanese king "emperor", saying "we have to serve Japan and the U.S." and "we should not blame visit to Yasukuni Shrine". She even said without hesitation that it is "shameful for south Korea to request Japan to make apology for the past".
					
					 Park Geun Ryong's husband Sin Tong Uk rushed to the hospital where the U.S. ambassador in south Korea was taken after sustaining a knife attack in front of which he performed "fast meant to beg apology for heinous crime" only to be blamed and jeered by the public.
					
					 Exposing the hideous anti-reunification crimes committed by the father and daughter, the indictment continued:
					
					 Park Chung-hee belittled and insulted the July 4 joint statement which the north and the south agreed for the first time as "a piece of paper" and has opted for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and national division.
					
					 The grudge-bearing concrete wall that cuts across the territory of Korea is a clear proof of the anti-reunification crime committed by traitor Park Chung-hee.
					
					 Park Geun Hye's hysteric fit will make even her father get dumbfounded.
					
					 Soon after becoming the boss of Chongwadae, she trumpeted about "north policy" such as "confidence-building process" and "Dresden declaration", disclosing her ambition for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and unification of systems and insulted the sacred desire for reunification of the nation with such vulgar words as "luck for unification" used by traders and gamblers.
					
					 She wined and dined human scum at Chongwadae and egged them on to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets and set up the UN "office on human rights in north", anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization, in south Korea which her predecessors dared not.
					
					 She closed the Kaesong Industrial Zone, a product of the June 15 era of reunification and the last hope of the north-south relations, an anti-reunification and confrontational act putting into the shade the crime committed by her father by building a concrete wall to divide the territory of the country into two.
					
					 She is holding all kinds of DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises together with her American and Japanese masters almost every day and is agitating "defection from the north", not content with the racket for smear "human rights" campaign against the DPRK. These remind one of the hysteria of her father who kicked up the racket for a war against the north as they can be committed only by the offspring of traitor Park Chung-hee who dreamed a wild dream while crying out for "unification by prevailing over communism".
					
					 Exposing the "new records" of tyranny set by the dictatorial family, the indictment goes on:
					
					 Through 18 years of office Park Chung-hee enacted fascist evil laws of all descriptions and formed suppression organizations, turning whole south Korea into military prison, an area without freedom and human rights and a veritable hell.
					
					 At the hands of the dictator, more than 2,000 evil laws were enacted or retrogressively revised.
					
					 Park Geun Hye eulogized and justified her father's dictatorial rule and fully revived "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 She turned south Korea into the barren land of democracy and human rights while crying out for "defending system" and "eliminating the forces following the north".
					
					 Park Chung-hee and Park Geun Hye worked harder than any other successive puppet rulers to suppress legitimate media as evidenced by the ban on Minjok Ilbo and Jaju Minbo.
					
					 Park Geun Hye family members are all ugly human rejects.
					
					 History and nation will never pardon such despicable group.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, the eldest daughter of the family of traitors, is waiting for the stern punishment by history while breathing her last in a dark room in Chongwadae with her "presidential" duty suspended.
					
					 Miserable end is an unavoidable fate sealed for the most despicable family of traitors.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from V.V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on Feb. 13.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un, the Workers' Party of Korea and all heroic Korean people on the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, significant day.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's glorious life is recorded in gilt letters in the history of the DPRK, in history of friendship between the two countries and in history of progressive mankind, the message said.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK greater success in the efforts for building socialist society and achieving durable peace in the region and on the earth.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, who took part in celebrations of the Day of Shining Star, before their departure.
					 Kim Jong Un invited the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan to visit the homeland, let them take part in all celebrations and bestowed all kinds of trust and loving care on them just as leader Kim Jong Il did, even though he was busy leading the cause of building socialist power and the confrontation with the U.S. to victory, the letter said.
					
					 The celebrations of the 75th anniversary of the birth of Kim Jong Il was a great political festival for wishing for the immortality of the leader, an reflection of the noble world of loyalty of Kim Jong Un for Kim Jong Il, it noted, adding:
					
					 Visiting several places during stay in homeland, they could keenly cherish the great personality of Kim Jong Un and certainly picture the bright future of socialist Korea making leaping progress with the self-development as a great driving force.
					
					 Kim Jong Un who is demonstrating the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation all over the world while creating legendary stories of noble loyalty and noble loving care for the people and the future generations is peerless patriot, kind father of the people and great sun who is working hard for the prosperity of all generations to come of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, the letter said.
					
					 It stressed that it is the fixed faith and will they cherished deep in their hearts during their visit to homeland that victory of the sun's Korea is science and the heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan will be guaranteed only when the behests of Kim Jong Il and the important teachings of Kim Jong Un are thoroughly implemented.

articles.title: National Acrobatic Troupe Gives Performance in Hamhung
articles.content:
National Acrobatic Troupe Gives Performance in Hamhung
 Hamhung, February 26 (KCNA) -- The performance given by the National Acrobatic Troupe ended at the Hamhung Grand Theater Sunday. The performance started from Jan. 25. 
					 Enjoying the performance were workers of many different units, people from all walks of life, school youth and children in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as physical acrobatics "Standing Etude" and comical circus "Trick with Caps".
					
					 The audience was drawn to the world of mystery.
					
					 Artistes of the troupe gave performances at the February 8 Vinalon Complex and the Tonghungsan-Unha Garment Factory.

articles.title: Papers Term Hong Yong Phyo Confrontation Maniac
articles.content:
Papers Term Hong Yong Phyo Confrontation Maniac
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Puppet Unification Minister of south Korea Hong Yong Phyo held an "invitation round-table talk" shortly ago at which he wagged his tongue recklessly, sparking off accusation.
					 He asserted that the shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Zone was the "greatest success" in the implementation of the "policy toward the north" and traitor Park Geun Hye's address for "gaining a great opportunity of unification" sparked off the people's "attention and enthusiasm". 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary brands Hong Yong Phyo as a confrontation maniac who totally cut off the inter-Korean relations while parroting Park, being indifferent to the issue of reunification.
					
					 South Korean people from all walks of life are now blaming the shutdown of the KIZ as the greatest failure in traitor Park's "policy toward the north", the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The hideous crime the traitorous Park group, obsessed with confrontation with compatriots in the north, committed by dashing the last hope of the north-south relations can never be written off nor covered up.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Hong let out a spate of invective that the total suspension of the KIZ operation could have been "bitterer pain" and "severe price" for someone. This rhetoric can be made only by a heinous confrontational maniac.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary charges that Hong spouted invective inciting confrontation though he is in the position to be judged by history together with traitor Park.
					
					 He will be made to realize how miserable doom he will face for his thoughtless tongue-wagging, it warns.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Kuwait Times on February 14 brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 And it indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries and regions between January 25 and February 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included celebration meeting, seminar, lecture meeting, reading session, book exhibition and film show.
					
					 Exhibited at their venues were works of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Korean books.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun" were shown.
					
					 The rector of Mongolia's "Gor King-Erdene" Institute of Teachers said that Kim Jong Il authored various works to give perfect answers to the questions arising in developing the country by its own efforts. Not only the class called after his august name but also all teachers and students of our institute are deeply studying the Juche idea, the rector added.
					
					 The chairperson of the Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star said that Kim Jong Il is the great leader of the Korean people and an outstanding revolutionary as he had led the Korean revolution to victory and conducted energetic activities for the cause of global independence.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said that Kim Jong Il clearly showed the road ahead of the human cause of independence through his extraordinary ideo-theoretical activities.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, said that history knows no such great persons as the leaders of the DPRK who received so many precious gifts from prominent personages of different countries.

articles.title: Songun Politics to Be Studied in Brazil
articles.content:
Songun Politics to Be Studied in Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian center for the study of Songun Politics was formed at the State University of Rio de Janeiro on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Lucas Rubio was elected chairman of the center.
					
					 He posted on a website the following article:
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics is an organization for studying and disseminating the Songun politics of the DPRK.
					
					 It is very important in the present world to understand the Songun politics.
					
					 Anyone should understand why the DPRK keeps making military affairs the top priority.
					
					 It is needed to have understanding of Songun in order to properly assess the complicated and acute situation of the Korean Peninsula as the DPRK is called a "closed state".
					
					 Western media are wasting time away in slandering socialist Korea. This makes people have misunderstanding of the DPRK, thinking it is making a huge investment in bolstering military forces to threaten its neighboring countries and strike the U.S. with nuclear weapons.
					
					 However, the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is by no means to threaten others.
					
					 The Songun politics proves its purpose.
					
					 It is the great strategy for national defense.
					
					 The Songun politics, a basic political mode under socialism, enables the DPRK to defend the country, revolution and socialism and dynamically accelerate the overall socialist construction in reliance on the revolutionary spirit of the People's Army and its militant might.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Such events as reception, seminar, round-table talks, book, photo and handicraft exhibition and film show took place at DPRK missions in various countries between February 8 and 15 to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the missions in Russia, China, Mongolia, Vietnam, Laos, Nepal, Malaysia, Myanmar, Singapore, Iran, India, Cambodia, Indonesia, Pakistan, Germany, Hungary, Britain, Romania, Belarus, Bulgaria, Switzerland, the Czech Republic, France, Poland, Spain and Italy.
					
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu and books, pictures and handicraft introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Such Korean films as "The Sun of Songun Sheds Its Rays All over the World" were shown.
					
					 Personages of different circles in those countries were invited to the events.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and art works depicting the leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers at the events praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il.
